metadata.title: USN-3513-1 -- libxml2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libxml2 incorrecty handled certain files. An attacker could use this issue with specially constructed XML data to cause libxml2 to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3513-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.12 libxml2-utils - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.12 libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.12 libxml2-udeb - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.12 libxml2-doc - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.12 libxml2-dev - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.12 No subscription required
